entry.title: A nest of vampires
entry.summary:
Author: BIAP00

Summary: ¿Qué sucede cuando una horda de criaturas sobrenaturales llega a Beacon Hills para sembrar caos y temor?La manada lo prohibió desde que aparecieron; no querían involucrarse hasta estar seguros de lo que estaba ocurriendo. Sin embargo, él no podía quedarse quieto, no después de sentir que su mente se estaba desmoronando.Mieczyslaw Stilinski.El humano que camina junto a los lobos. Cansado y consumido por el Nogitsune, decide tomarse un descanso de lo sobrenatural. Pero el destino tiene planes diferentes a los de él.Una colonia de murciélagos, una persona que llevaba años desaparecida, una cacería, una masacre y mucho caos. ¿Crees poder con todo esto?La sangre corre por los árboles, huele a traición, a devastación...¿Podrás mantener tu moral en pie?¿Descubrir quién eres realmente?---Fanfic de Teen Wolf.⚠️ Advertencia ⚠️_Ship principal: Derek Hale x Stiles Stilinski._No sigo el canon, así que no esperen que las parejas sean las mismas que allí._Esto no sigue la línea de tiempo de la serie._Puedes encontrar tanto ships heterosexuales como homosexuales._Los personajes no me pertenecen; son de Jeff Davis.

entry.title: Alone Together
entry.summary:
Author: YourDarling04

Summary: It was a Tuesday morning when they got the call.“Hello?”“Hello, is this Jonathan Stilinski?”“Yeah, that's me.”“I'm calling in relation to a Mic-Misz-”"We just call him Stiles. What's he done now?”“Mr. Stilinski… I'm so sorry for your loss.”In which Peter gains a pack and a family, but remember children, nothing good comes for free.

entry.title: Sanctuary For The Thrall
entry.summary:
Author: TheNewPenguin

Summary: He hadn’t slept since his escape. He couldn’t sleep on the bus, his mind far too busy trying to make sense of the nonsensical. He was exhausted and whatever this thing was on him… it was as if he could feel it drain his energy a little bit every day. He shook his head to try clear his mind and became aware of the fact that the people around him were moving. He hadn’t even felt the bust stop.Tags will be updated as story progresses.

entry.title: Undercover Hearts
entry.summary:
Author: Underworld765

Summary: Stiles Stilinski has always played the part of the quirky human in a world of supernatural chaos, but beneath the humor and calm demeanor, he's a man with powerful connections—ones that could change everything for the pack. When a Wendigo threatens Beacon Hills, Stiles' secretive work takes center stage, forcing him to work closely with Derek Hale. As the danger escalates, so do the feelings between them, igniting a passion neither of them expected. With secrets unraveling and tensions rising, Stiles and Derek must confront not just their enemies, but the undeniable connection between them. ---- Small Scene----Derek’s gaze softened slightly, but only just. “You know I don’t like when you keep things from me.”Stiles’ grin faltered for a second, but he quickly recovered. “Hey, I’m not hiding anything major. Just... a few things here and there. But let’s focus on the important stuff.” He patted the couch next to him. “Like the fact that I have three days off, and you’re gonna sit here with me and watch a movie. It’s a Friday night tradition!”Derek sighed, exasperated but also a little resigned. “What movie are we watching?”

entry.title: Through Another's Eyes
entry.summary:
Author: Kilani

Summary: Stiles wakes up in a world that isn’t his—in a body that shouldn’t be his. Familiar faces surround him, yet everything feels wrong. Worst of all? He’s engaged to Derek Hale—a man he’s sure doesn’t like him, let alone want to marry him. With memories that aren’t his own and a past that doesn’t add up, Stiles must unravel the truth before he loses himself completely.

entry.title: Scar Tissue
entry.summary:
Author: Halevetica

Summary: Derek hasn't worked with a partner in years, it's easier to keep his secret if he's alone. However, a new case against a family he's been wanting to take down falls into his lap, only it comes with a catch, he must accept a new partner. He doesn't know if he can work with someone again. But he's desperate to take down the family that took everything from him. All he has to do is keep his new partner in the dark. But what if his new partner has a secret of his own?

entry.summary:
Author: misteeirene

Summary: Stiles runs away from Beacon Hills after he was pushed out of the pack. At his lowest, he meets someone who teaches him what true love is and what it’s like to be someone’s number one priority. After a brutal attack by another alpha, Stiles looses the man he had planned to spend the rest of his life with. Can he forgive his father, Derek, and old pack and allow them to help him heal?

entry.title: Stiles Come Home
entry.summary:
Author: SpaceAce281990

Summary: Stiles was kidnapped from the hospital, hours after being born. He was raised by a misguided spark who thought he was hers and then taken away and placed in foster care. Sheriff John Stilinski had never stopped looking for his son, efforts doubling once his wife died and his son's case went cold. When he gets the call that the woman who had stolen his son had come forward, confessed, and he provides what he needs to prove that Stiles is his son, he is elated, emotional, and scared. What had his son went through all of those years and could he work to be the father he had always wanted to be?And could he answer Stiles' first question. "Are you Batman?"

entry.title: The Call of the Night
entry.summary:
Author: Pdxtrent

Summary: After the events of week of the Wolf Moon, Agent Rafael McCall seems determined to uncover all of the secrets everyone is keeping, and Derek and Stiles begin to worry about exactly what he plans to do with that information.At the same time, Laura and the newly forming pack are dealing with Derek’s new alpha power and trying to help Jackson deal with his new problems as well.This is part two of a continuing story, there’s a brief synopsis of what came before that I’ve added, in case you want to dive in on part two. But there’s a lot of details in part one that will be helpful going forward.This is gradually going to become more AU as things progress, because unlike the show there are ramifications for actions in my world.If you want to know where this starts to depart from the Teen Wolf universe, it’s probably around ten years in the past when Deucalion attacked Allison Argent, and was put down for it with the assistance of several wolf packs. Enjoy!

entry.title: Beneath the Layers
entry.summary:
Author: themistakenwolfe

Summary: It was a talent, really. The way Stiles could mask his pain, hide the bruises, and act like everything was fine. Years of practice made him a master at deception. The Sheriff was a hero in Beacon Hills, the man everyone respected. Who would believe his son was the one suffering behind closed doors?Stiles had figured out how to dull the scent of pain around the pack. Wolfsbane in small doses, masking agents in his detergent, and sheer force of will kept them from knowing. No one ever suspected. No one ever looked too close. And that was exactly how he wanted it.Until Derek.

entry.title: The Spark and the Four Alphas
entry.summary:
Author: Lolamays

Summary: Stiles wasn’t just an agent. He was a shadow slipping between worlds, torn between obedience and defiance. In the realm of sorcery, where magic tangled with law, and the Magical FBI reigned over chaos, he was given an impossible mission: to tame four alphas—werewolves shattered like old, fractured mirrors.They were dangerous. Unyielding. Creatures who refused to bow to rules written by those who had never felt their hunger, their rage. His task was clear—reshape them, break their wildness, make them fit for society. But between the cold directives from his superiors and the burning, defiant eyes staring at him from behind invisible bars, a question clawed at his mind.Was he here to fix them? Or to break what little remained of their souls?
